item.title: 22 errors
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

I was following this tutorial and I added:

					if (npcs[i].npcType == 2642) { 
					{ 
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true; 
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; 
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Nobody likes bad people..."; 
						} 
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 228) { 
					{ 
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true; 
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; 
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Serves you right!"; 
						} 
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 260) { 
					{ 
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true; 
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; 
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Haha im free and you're not!"; 
						} 
					}
					if (npcs[i].npcType == 562) { 
					{ 
						npcs[i].updateRequired = true; 
						npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; 
							npcs[i].textUpdate = "Walk upstairs to go to trial... gl noob"; 
						} 
					}

and my compiler said:

.\src\NPCHandler.java:2973: illegal start of expression public int randomjadBattle() { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2973: ';' expected public int randomjadBattle() { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2977: illegal start of expression public int randomrangeBattle() { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2977: ';' expected public int randomrangeBattle() { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2981: illegal start of expression public int randomtzBattle() { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2981: ';' expected public int randomtzBattle() { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2985: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2985: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2985: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackNPC(int NPCID) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2999: illegal start of expression public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2999: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:2999: ';' expected public boolean ResetAttackPlayer(int NPCID) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: illegal start of expression public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: illegal start of expression public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: ';' expected public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: expected public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: not a statement public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: ';' expected public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: expected public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: not a statement public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3012: ';' expected public void spawnANPC(int npcID, int absX, int absY, int height) { ^ .\src\NPCHandler.java:3017: reached end of file while parsing } ^ 22 errors Press any key Anyone know why?
